api_list.name: Time and Date
api_list.description: Returns Time, Date, Timezone, State, Country, Lat Long for the given city name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-time-prayer-times-and-weather.p.rapidapi.com/city/islamabad"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-time-prayer-times-and-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-time-prayer-times-and-weather.p.rapidapi.com/city/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-time-prayer-times-and-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
